description:
Gage is an adorable muscle stud and when he first appeared on the site we received a lot of e-mail from people who wanted to see more of him.
Gavin loves muscular guys — and if they're country boys that's even better!
I love Gage's hairy body and couldn't wait to see him get it on. He'd never fucked another guy before but I knew he'd do great. He and Gavin were a good match and Gage fucked him so well that Gavin was shaking afterward!
title: Gage & Gavin
